metadata.name: Using SettingSyncHost.exe as LOLBin
metadata.comment: Detects using SettingSyncHost.exe to run hijacked binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\'))) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('roamdiag.cmd')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-outputpath')))

output.summary: Detects using SettingSyncHost.exe to run hijacked binary

metadata.objective: Examine fields: TargetFilename, process.name False positive: Unknown Reference: https://www.hexacorn.com/blog/2020/02/02/settingsynchost-exe-as-a-lolbin
